column4: on the internet the text is too small to read im on eeebuntu which is a ubuntu 8.10 but mod'ed for netbooks can anyone help?
on the internet the text is too small to read im on eeebuntu which is a ubuntu 8.10 but mod'ed for netbooks can anyone help?
hold control and two finger scroll
there is a firefox option in edit/preferences for default text size so you dont have to do that all the time
